title.rendered: 101 Answers to the Toughest Interview Questions

content.rendered:
101 Great Answers to the Toughest Interview Questions is a manual that will show you exactly what your interviewer may be trying to learn with each and every question he or she asks. If you’ve never done well in interviews, never even been on a job interview or just want to make sure a lousy interview doesn’t cost you a job you really want, this is the book for you.

Thoroughly updated to reflect the realities of today’s job market, you will find within these pages the answers to every interview-related question you may have. Whatever your age and experience, whether you are seeking your very first job or finally breaking into the executive office, this is the book you need to get that job.
